title: Sacred Trip along with the adventure activities (aspen adventures)
text: By aspen adventures Aug 5, 2015 India is a great country having rich in heritage, culture, temples, architectures and monuments. If you want to spend your holidays with great fun and enjoy, must visit this country where you not only find the great places, some very adventurous activities too. Camping in Rishikesh there are so many different types of places in India with its specialty. You will definitely feel fresh and energetic after visiting various places in India. Uttarakhand is one of the most famous states where you can go on your holidays. The activities you must do and the places you must go are - Sacred Trip - Uttarakhand is a place where you find a lot of temples, churches, Gurudwaras and other sacred places. Haridwar and Rishikesh are the places known for its temples and these places are situated at the banks of holy river Ganges. In Uttarakhand, you can go for your "Char Dham" Yatra and the four holy towns are Kedarnath, Badrinath, Yamunotri and Gangotri. Feel the nature - If you want to take a nature walk, this is the best place. The lush green jungles with so many wild animals and beautiful birds will definitely attract you. There are so many beautiful hill stations are the main attraction of this state. At the time of summer, so many tourists visit this place to get relaxed and in winter, snow capped mountains look awesome. Jungle Safaris - Jim Corbett National Park is the national park where you can start your morning with the voice of tigers and other wild animals. You can find the wild animals like tigers, wild elephants, jackals and so many species of birds in this jungle. Jeep safari and elephant safari is very popular here. Thrilling Adventure Sports - People from all the corners of the world visit this place to enjoy the thrilling adventure sports. The activities like trekking, mountain climbing, white water rafting, Paragliding etc. are the activities that you can enjoy here. White Water Rishikesh Rafting is one of the most famous activities to do. It is bit thrill, but exciting too. Rafting in Rishikesh has so many different levels and you can fully enjoy the basic levels of rafting under the guidance of experts. The top levels are too risky and it is performed only by the experts in this field. So, plan this year to this great place and fully enjoy your holidays with so many different types of activities.
